description.desc1: Loads and applies Raymarching GLSL shaders in 3D space. Shaders of the likes you can find on ShaderToy.org

shader.descript: shader file. Needs to be in the MaxJitter format for GLSL shaders

camera.descript: BoxMapCamera node. From here are the rays cast outward.

Notes.note1: Unfortunately it is not a simple copy-paste process to transform a ShaderToy-shader into a RayMarching-node shader. While 95% of the code can usually be reused, the shader needs to be embedded inside a Max-Jitter style GLSL shader file, plus some adjustments need to be made in order make a shader to work in a 3d context.
Notes.note2: Check out the SparckExamples for a selection of about 25 of my favourite shadertoy shaders which I already translated for this node.

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
